body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Samuel Gray and I work for Bright Travel, how may I assist you today? May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janet. To assist you better, may I kindly know your booking reference number and the last four digits of the credit card used to make the reservation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My booking reference number is six three four two and the last four digits of the credit card are seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Janet. Can you also confirm your check-in date and the total number of nights you booked the hotel for, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The check-in date was the third of November, and I booked the hotel for five nights.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming those details, Janet. I'll review your reservation and get back to you shortly with more information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time and patience. Thank you for reaching out to us, Janet. Have a wonderful day ahead!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Samuel. I look forward to hearing from you. Goodbye.
